input_schema.description: An array of cat photos to be ranked

items.description: A cat photo with its URL and optional metadata

url.description: The URL or file path to the cat photo image

title.description: An optional title or label for the photo

photographer.description: An optional credit to the photographer

content.text: Share an example of a cat photo where the background colors and tones beautifully complement the cat's appearance, creating a unified and harmonious aesthetic experience.
Show me a cat photo where the cat is unmistakably the primary focal point, with the viewer's eye naturally drawn to the subject as the main attraction, free from competing visual distractions.

Share a cat photo where the surrounding environment reveals something meaningful about the catâ€”its personality, habitat, lifestyle, or emotional state. The context should enrich our understanding of the cat.

Show me a cat photo that demonstrates intentional compositional choices, where the photographer clearly positioned the cat and framed the environment to create meaningful visual relationships and support the cat as the subject.

description: Ranks cat photographs based on how well their backgrounds and environments support the cat as the primary subject. Evaluates visual harmony, subject prominence, contextual meaning, and compositional intent to identify photos where every element enhances rather than distracts from the cat.
